CustomField.description:
Captures the name of the other core lab / facility to whom work is being sent if user selects 'Other' as the Abandon Reason. Jira Story # CMCM-9570.
Data Owner: Roxanne Hendricks
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the other core lab / facility here when the needed value does not appear in the list provided. If unspecified, enter Unknown.
CustomField.label: Core Lab - Other
